Contradict fact: The claim does not contradict any known facts.
Exaggerate: The claim does not contain any exaggerated information.
Understate: The claim does not understate any information.
Falters at times: The claim does not falter at any point.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks support as it is proven to be a scam.
Problematic assumption: The claim does not contain any problematic assumptions.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not have any alternative explanations.
